name: Kuro no Ken: Blade of the Darkness
overview: Long ago the evil Black Dragon killed thousands of people and caused a lot of pain in the kingdom. The monks pray to God and with his power they created a magic sword that will destroy the Black Dragon and a hero used that sword to capture and sealed the Black Dragon. But now the Black Dragon broke the sealed and had escaped, and now only Shinobu a descent of the hero that defeated the Black Dragon the first time and Called a knight that wants to becomes a hero can try to defeat the Dragon again. Kuro no ken - Blade of the Darkness is a classic RPG game in which the player controls a young heroine called Shinobu in his quest to defeat the evil Black Dragon, so she will journey through the land to complete her adventure.
